woskwislt.jcr:title: Sleek Insulated Coat
woskwislt.summary: Stay warm but avoid that 'overstuffed' look with our Sleek Insulated Coat. It offers warmth without bulk.
woskwislt.features:
• Water and stain-resistant
  • Lightweight primaloft insulation is quick drying, insulates when wet
  • Imported.
  • Machine wash and dry.
woskwislt.reviews:
By Carri U
from Philadelphia

I got this as a gift for my Mom. She absolutely loves it! She has had an issue with finding just the right winter coat. This one is lightweight, yet warm. Stylish, not too puffy. Kudos for pleasing a hard to please Mom!

wootwisot.jcr:title: Sonja Insulated Jacket
wootwisot.summary: Warm and waterproof mountain performance is enhanced with stylish accents like faux fur trim, for wear both on the mountain and apr√®s-ski.
wootwisot.features:
• Synthetic shell features waterproof, breathable coating; taped critical seams add weather protection
  • Polyester insulation hoards warmth on the inside
  • Integrated hood features removable faux fur trim for a dash of style
  • Stretch inner cuffs with thumbholes add warmth and an extra barrier against snow entry
wootwisot.reviews:
By lsu8861
from New York, NY

I'm about 4'11" at 100lbs and bought the extra small. Since I'm short, this jacket was a little big on me, but I prefer jackets a little bigger so I can layer and it covers the butt to keep you warmer in the winter. The sleeves were long too, but that's to be expected when you're my height, and that never bothers me. Anyone who is taller this jacket will fit better on them.

I bought this jacket to go snowboarding for the first time, and needed a warm, but breathable jacket that wasn't too bulky. This was my 4th jacket this year. I wanted a jacket that I could wear casually on the weekends in the New York winter when it snows or rains. This jacket is perfect. It's warm with mesh ventilation if needed, secret pockets that your things won't fall out of (because of the velcro and buttons) It gives you extra room to layer underneath and won't be too bulky.

gloves.jcr:title: Gloves
gloves.summary: The perfect fit keeps your hands warm but flexible. Tactile grip ensures no loss of control with sweat wicking interior.

hiking_pants.jcr:title: Hiking Pants
hiking_pants.summary: Stay cool, crisp and dry. High performance materials breathe well while giving you flexibility during those long treks.
hiking_pants.features: Stay cool, crisp and dry. High performance materials breathe well while giving you flexibility during those long treks.

faba_running_pants.jcr:title: Faba Running Pants
faba_running_pants.summary: So versatile you'll wear it for running, yoga, or even just lounging around on the weekends.  Super cool stretch material fits your every move.

wohisufls.jcr:title: Fleet Fox Running Shorts
wohisufls.summary: These shorts live up to their name with an ultra-flattering fit and performance styling. Featuring details like a comfortable elastic waist with mesh brief and a hidden media pocket, you're sure to keep the competition on their toes.
wohisufls.features:
• Antimicrobial treatment in waistband fights post-workout funkiness
  • Elastic waistband with drawcord ensures a comfortable fit
  • Internal pocket stashes a key
wohisufls.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.

wohisucat.jcr:title: Candide Trail Short
wohisucat.summary: The best of all possible worlds: The Candide short can go just about anywhere thanks to a versatile fabric blend.
wohisucat.features:
• Combines the comfort of cotton with the fast drying time of polyester; some stretch is added to enhance easy motion, and fabric is washed for softness
  • Waistband lining wicks moisture; zip fly, button closure and belt loops
  • Inseam gusset and curved back hems enhance freedom of movement
wohisucat.reviews:
By jconnell
From Phoenix, AZ

These fit absolutely perfectly on me and come out of the wash looking great. They don't stretch out as you wear them, which I love!



By MelissaT
from Salt Lake City, UT

These shorts ran a little big and a little long. These are the most comfortable shorts I have ever worn. The cut is great for a girl with hips, the waist sat perfectly on mine

wohisudes.jcr:title: Desert Sky Shorts
wohisudes.summary: Soft and relaxed, these twill shorts have been sandwashed for an extra smooth, light drape.
wohisudes.features:
• Zip fly and buttoned waistband
  • 5 pockets
  • Printed interior waistband
  • Leather belt tie
  • Lightweight
wohisudes.reviews:
By teddy cat
from sanford, FL

These shorts are a home run! They are casual and fun, the length is *perfect* and they could be dressed up or down. I think they are very flattering in the rear (always GOOD) These colors are fab...but khaki and denim would be a great addition.

woswsubas.jcr:title: Bahamas Shorts
woswsubas.summary: Lightweight plaid cotton adds a boost of trendsetting style to our favorite shorts. Chic and sporty for the beach and beyond, you won't find another pair of shorts with as much playful attitude
woswsubas.features:
• Banded waist with belt loops.
  • Button closure, zip fly.
  • Flat front.
  • Angled side pockets with slot pocket on one side.
woswsubas.reviews:
By referee mom
from Columbus

I am in love with these. The pattern is just great. I pair them with a shirt in fuchsia and just love the color combination. I first thought I could only pair them with something white and was very surprised how well you can pair it with different colors.

wohisurit.jcr:title: Rios T Shirt
wohisurit.summary: The comfort of cotton blends with the technical advantage of stay-cool polyester in this sweet layering piece designed to take on the trails or just the city streets.
wohisurit.features:
• Lightweight, super soft textured fabric
  • Moisture wicking
  • Fast drying
  • Machine wash and dry
wohisurit.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed.  Be the first to write a review.

wootsudet.jcr:title: Devi Sleeveless Shirt
wootsudet.summary: Street-style inspiration with performance details set the Devi Shirt apart from the rest of your closet.
wootsudet.features:
• Modal Viscose/Spandex
  • Lightweight, great drape
  • Semi-fitted
  • Seaming panel details
wootsudet.reviews:
By bklyngirl
from Brooklyn, NY

I really like this tank for yoga. I wear it for Hot Vinyasa and love that it stays fitted to my body even when it is completely soaked. Fits wonderfully through the chest and the back. It is a bit of s struggle to pull on and off but definitely worth it for the fit. Lays flat against belly and moves freely but not flowing so it does not move in inverted positions. I am 5'7" and 120lbs and the small fits perfectly.

woswsusoc.jcr:title: Soleil Tunic
woswsusoc.summary: This lightweight silk/cotton tunic-style top doubles as the perfect swim cover up.
woswsusoc.features:
• Cotton/Silk
  • Super lightweight, soft, comfortable
  • Machine wash and lay flat to dry
woswsusoc.reviews:
By firedupps
from nashville,tn

This runs a little big I think, got the medium the first time and it kind of hung off on the shoulders a bit so I exchanged it for a small and it is perfect. This is the coolest looking top with leggings! I want to get another one! Also it washed really well, stayed true to size but I did let it air dry.

By Trixien
from West Michigan
This tunic is made of very soft material and it looks cute on. I expected it to be a little thicker, but it is okay. I ordered an XS (5'3 and 108 lbs).

spixa_runners.jcr:title: Spixa Runners
spixa_runners.summary: Featuring our latest mesh technology for ultimate flexibility.  Memory foam cushion hugs your feet in support during those long cross country runs.
spixa_runners.jcr:description: Featuring our latest mesh technology for ultimate flexibility.  Memory foam cushion hugs your feet in support during those long cross country runs.

eqrusubpe.jcr:title: BPA-Free Water Bottle
eqrusubpe.summary: BPA-free, our water bottle water bottle gives you quick access to hydration while at the gym or on the trail.
eqrusubpe.features:
Bottle is made with premium polycarbonate that is toxin free; inner surface is finished with an electrolyte charge and dolomitic sand blasting; finish is completely BPA free
Certified food-grade polypropylene threaded opening and screw-top lid create a spill-resistant seal; food-grade silicon gasket is used inside the lid to help prevent leaks
Shaped body features a narrow point near the neck of the bottle for easy grasping
eqrusubpe.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed.  Be the first to write a review.

eqrusufle.jcr:title: Fleet Cross-Training Shoe
eqrusufle.summary: The Fleet Cross-Training shoes provide an ideal platform for high-mileage runners looking for 1 pair of shoes to take them from the street to the trail and back again.
eqrusufle.features:
Quicklace_ lacing system takes just 1 pull for a perfect fit; lace pocket hides lacing away
Protective toe and heel caps guard against bumps and abrasion
frames run along the soles of the shoes to facilitate better heel-to-toe transitions
Triple-density EVA midsoles isolate you from trail impacts, and thermoplastic urethane inserts provide a barrier against sharp rocks underfoot
eqrusufle.reviews:
By ohsooocute
from Reseda, Ca
I do lots of trail walking in the San Gabriel Mountains. These shoes were comfortable from the start. I like the quick lacing system because my shoes stay tied the way I want from the start. They are lightweight, yet sturdy. Thanks mum for thr great birthday present.

basa_mp3_player.jcr:title: Basa MP3 Player
basa_mp3_player.summary: Carries up to 20,000 of your favorite tunes! Also features built in timer and workout monitor to track your energy and calories.

eqrusugor.jcr:title: GoMobile Fitness Monitor/Smart Music Player
eqrusugor.summary: The GoMobile fitness monitor and smart music player tracks your performance and pumps out tunes to keep you going.
eqrusugor.features:
GPS tracks your speed and distance while you run, walk and bike outdoors; built-in accelerometer tracks your speed, distance and steps taken during indoor workouts
8 gigabyte memory lets you load your favorite music; built-in FM tuner picks up local radio stations
Smart music player learns which songs help you run faster and burn more calories, and then compiles them into a high-performance playlist
eqrusugor.reviews:
By Texas Runner
from Dallas, TX

Battery life without GPS may be decent, but isn't the GPS tracking why someone would buy this device? It is completely worthless for marathon runners (and even some half marathon runners). Using GPS, but without music or bluetooth, I couldn't get more than 3 hours of battery life out of it while running. 

If you're a casual short distance runner/cyclist looking for an iPod that also measures speed/distance then maybe this will work for you. If you're training for longer distances, you will be extremely disappointed.

eqwrsnbd.jcr:title: Flying Snowboard
eqwrsnbd.summary: Often imitated, never outdone, and backed by a 20-year legacy as snowboarding‚Äôs one-board answer to all terrain.
eqwrsnbd.features: Since its humble beginnings, innovation has defined the Flying Snowboard series and set it apart as the most popular, versatile, and mimicked board in snowboarding. These days, the one-board answer to all terrain celebrates its 20-year reign with a proven formula that combines time-honored design and envelope-pushing ingredients for a lightweight, poppy, and stable snowboard that were unheard of two decades ago.
eqwrsnbd.reviews:
By NE2WA
from Edmonds, WA

This watch/gps/heart rate monitor is a data crunching gem. With the free online connection, you can actually watch a graphical display of your swim/run on a map with associated changes in your heart rate, pace and step rate (with the foot chip). It takes a little time to set up, but is simple to use once you get started. I am loving this device and the feedback it's giving me.

eqsusubed.jcr:title: Bear 8'8" Longboard
eqsusubed.summary: Whether you are looking for nose-riding time with smooth turns or making big cuts in smaller waves this board delivers. The board has great versatility for a longboard. Because the board is 8'8" it is small enough to handle slightly bigger waves but still
eqsusubed.features:
Polyurethane foam. 
Super heavy glass with a nice gloss coat gives this board some durability and weight.
eqsusubed.reviews:
By Plasma
from San Jose, CA
Great all round longboard. Good paddling and turning. Better in good waves due to large amount of rocker. Plenty of volume. Thick rails but the tail rocker means it turns well.

eqsusuthd.jcr:title: The Stretch Longboard
eqsusuthd.summary: The Stretch is agreat everyday longboard for beginners to intermediate surfers. It's extremely forgiving and balanced, which is great for beginners or more advanced surfers who just want an easy day of surfing.
eqsusuthd.features:
Longboard

3 fin

Polyurethane

Ideal Use

Waves: All around

Skill: Novice
eqsusuthd.reviews:
By Nico
from bluehawaii
This is the ultimate beginner surfboard. The board is soft so if you bump yourself or anyone else with the surfboard it's not going to be that bad. The boards are very bouyant and catch waves easily. The foam does get a little slick once you're in the water, so sometimes your feet may slip if you don't have them well planted. If you're just starting out surfing and want something safe, this is the board to go with.

eqsusurud.jcr:title: Rusty Parrot Shortboad
eqsusurud.summary: Currently our most popular high performance all around shortboard, the Rusty Parrot offers the same characteristics as what a pro would ride (fast, loose performance) but is made with slightly fuller dimensions to appeal to everyone.
eqsusurud.features:
Polyurethane, Balsa Wood
Hand shaped
High gloss finish
eqsusurud.reviews:
By jonnywhite
from bajasur
little thick but super fast in all surf.. your great all around cali board. THANKS..

eqsusuely.jcr:title: El Greco 8' Shorty
eqsusuely.summary: The El Greco has blended the nose riding capabilities of a longboard together with the maneuverability and speed of a shortboard. It's not a long short board, it's a short longboard.
eqsusuely.features:
EPS foam core with high density polyurethane band around the rails
Glassed with a Salmon Skin technology to provide durability without compromising flexibility
eqsusuely.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review

eqsusuevd.jcr:title: Even Keel Paddleboard
eqsusuevd.summary: Besides providing a new way to get on the water, paddleboarding develops core muscles and balance it's the perfect training activity for surfers, skiers and paddlers
eqsusuevd.features:
Incredibly stable 33 in. width offers stability that inspires confidence in beginning paddlers. 
EPS, epoxy and fiberglass construction reduces weight and creates high responsiveness
eqsusuevd.reviews:
By djslalom
from Lee Vining, CA
The board was nice to get started, but now that I've gotten my stroke down, a left turn bias has become dramatically apparent. A fin box misalignment might be causing this.  Finally, in less than a year, a bubble has appeared under the skin on the hull side (despite careful storage). Requests for a remedy from the manufacturer was deferred to the salesman, and both have become unresponsive. I would absolutely avoid this company and am spreading the word.

eqsusuchd.jcr:title: Chasing Tail Surfboard
eqsusuchd.summary: Full rails and extra flotation make this board ideal for mushed out summer waves.For the beginner to advanced surfer, this board works great in knee high to head high surf.
eqsusuchd.features:
Polyurethane, Balsa Wood
High gloss finish
eqsusuchd.reviews:
By surfersean20
from Kona
The california typical day board.this thing is sick.great for huge airs ad big gouges.this board makes airs easy!!

eqsusutho.jcr:title: The Neutrino
eqsusutho.summary: With its pronounced rocker, the Neutrino is a natural choice for steep faces and on-rail surfing. Single concave gives the board plenty of drive for critical situations.
eqsusutho.features:
Polyurethane, Balsa Wood
Hand shaped
High gloss finish
eqsusutho.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review

hiking_poles.jcr:title: Hiking Poles
hiking_poles.summary: Increase your hiking time with the ease and comfort of hiking poles.  Rust proof and added traction make this a versatile essential for any hiker.
hiking_poles.jcr:description: Increase your hiking time with the ease and comfort of hiking poles.  Rust proof and added traction make this a versatile essential for any hiker.

eqbisuset.jcr:title: Sequoia Bike Helmet
eqbisuset.summary: As close as you can get to air-conditioned head protection on the single track--and top-of-the-line performance features too!
eqbisuset.features:
A massive 18 vents channel cooling airflow across your cranium
Removable visor blocks sun and other elements, or can be removed for a streamlined look
Meets or exceeds U.S. CPSC standards for bicycle helmets
eqbisuset.reviews:
By MTBxplorer
from Orange County, California
I dislike wearing any thing on my head (hat, helmet, etc.) However, I enjoy the comfort of this helmet. Excellent choice for anyone who don't like to wear helmet, but feels it is necessary.

By HaGau
from Seattle, WA
This is a great helmet. I liked it so much that I bought it again after my first one cracked. The helmet has lots of ventilation holes which make it easy to mount lights to both the front and back of it. It also has a nice fitting/padding system which allows it to fit nicely to your head.

eqbisucos.jcr:title: Comfort Gel Gloves
eqbisucos.summary: Comfort Gel bike gloves offer cooling comfort, UV protection and bump-damping support. Just what you need for a long day on the road.
eqbisucos.features:
Anatomically positioned gel pads on palms absorb shock, protecting nerves in wrists
Mesh palms help reduce overheating and perspiraton
Polyester stretch fabric on back of hands wicks moisture and enhances ventilation
eqbisucos.reviews:
By ExplodingZero
from Cincinnati, OH
Great design and fit. Breathable material on the top feels great and lets your skin breathe pretty well. My bike lacks shocks and after riding my hands and sometimes shoulders would be pretty sore. These have padding in all the right spots without feeling heavy. The packaging listed a few pressure points and nerve endings that it protects and I'd have to say it does just that. There's also a small loop on the ring finger of each glove that gives you a good pull point to get them off without having to work too hard. It's a nice feature and it's almost invisible. The fastner uses a loop and hook that isn't scratchy at all. The styling looks great to top it all off. I just got them recently, so I can't comment on durability.

eqbisucol.jcr:title: Compact Chain Tool
eqbisucol.summary: This lightweight, compact chain tool is built to travel! Fits into any pocket or bike bag, yet performs like a shop-quality instrument.
eqbisucol.features:
Works on any chain, including Hyperglide
Has a built-in shelf for loosening tight links
eqbisucol.reviews:
By gcsailing
from Biloxi, MS
I broke my bike chain not far from my house and decided to use this tool to put on a spare chain I had. After two hours of trying to line the pin up I still could not get it to go into the chain link. I don't know if I was just doing something wrong but even after reading the directions supplied with the tool I could not fix the chain. I ended up taking it to a bike shop and getting it fixed for less than the cost of the tool.

eqbisublp.jcr:title: Blast Mini Pump
eqbisublp.summary: The Blast mini pump features an efficient single-stroke pumping action that inflates tires up to 90 psi.
eqbisublp.features:
T-handle provides solid grip and comfort while pumping
Works with both Presta and Schrader valves
Dust cap keeps internal pump head free from debris
eqbisublp.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.

eqbisumas.jcr:title: Marin Mountain Bike Shoes
eqbisumas.summary: Marin mountain bike shoes offer a supportive fit with a supple upper and a stiff, lugged sole to enhance pedal efficiency when grinding uphill and through the dirt.
eqbisumas.features:
Microfiber synthetic leather and nylon mesh uppers give a glovelike fit with excellent breathability
Carbon composite road soles offer more rigidity than a nylon sole, providing a direct connection with the pedal, solid power transfer and excellent aerodynamics
High traction lugs on outsoles enhance grip and durability in muddy conditions
eqbisumas.reviews:
By Boise mtn biker

from Boise, ID Great shoe. Been riding a long time and tried many shoes, this one is well built, fits me as well as any mtn bike shoe I've had, and seems like it will last.  If  you don't want to spend $$$ on carbon soled shoes, these shoes might do you well.

eqbisumxs.jcr:title: MX121 Sport Pedals
eqbisumxs.summary: MX121 Sport Pedals work with cleats and without you decide whether to clip in or to flip pedals and crank on the wide platform.
eqbisumxs.features:
Ideal for recumbents, commuters and recreational cyclists. the SPD compatible step-in system flips over to a concave, stable pedaling platform
Pedals feature durable chromoly spindles with 8mm Allen wrench mounts and low-maintenance sealed-bearing-cartridge axles
eqbisumxs.reviews:
By GTI_Driver
from Switzerland
I have a hybrid bike. These pedals suit perfectly my needs. Daily comute to work with a solid base, intuitive to position your foot without looking too much. When going to the hills using the cleats they are also reliable and shape helps to quickly find the correct side! Cleats don't come off even on a quite-loose set up.

Also like the design & weight.
For a hybrid these are ok. Don't think them for a mountain bike or a full road one.

eqswsupus.jcr:title: Pufferfish Snorkeling Fins
eqswsupus.summary: Pufferfish Snorkeling Fins make it easy to explore tropical reefs and freshwater aquatic life with minimal effort and maximum comfort.
eqswsupus.features:
Wasy to get on and off your feet thanks to a quick-release strap system
Angle of blade is optimized for maximum thrust with minimal effort
Center groove channels water to enhance your glide
eqswsupus.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.

eqswsuaqr.jcr:title: Aqua Force GPS Fitness Monitor
eqswsuaqr.summary: Waterproof GPS fitness monitor accurately records and displays your time, distance, and heart rate while you swim (or run) to help you attain your fitness goals.
eqswsuaqr.features:
Water-resistant construction meets IPX7 standards 
Includes the standard wrist strap and 2 fabric replacement straps that fit a variety of wrist sizes
Optional heart rate monitor strap (sold separately) lets you track heart rate for optimal performance; add the strap and gain access to 5 customizable heart rate zones
eqswsuaqr.reviews:
By NE2WA
from Edmonds, WA

This watch/gps/heart rate monitor is a data crunching gem. With the free online connection, you can actually watch a graphical display of your swim/run on a map with associated changes in your heart rate, pace and step rate (with the foot chip). It takes a little time to set up, but is simple to use once you get started. I am loving this device and the feedback it's giving me.

eqswsucal.jcr:title: Cabana Stripe Towel
eqswsucal.summary: Soft cotton, cheerful stripes and an extra long length set our Cabana Stripe Towel apart.
eqswsucal.features:
36x72 oversized shape
Soft terry cloth cotton
Colorfast stripes
eqswsucal.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.

eqswsuprs.jcr:title: Pro Series Swim Goggles
eqswsuprs.summary: Bring your training goals into focus with startling clarity in the Pro Series Swim Goggles.
eqswsuprs.features:
Thermoplastic rubber gaskets and a multiple nosepiece system personalize the fit (includes 5 nosepieces)
Antifog, optical-grade polycarbonate lenses allow excellent peripheral vision
Double silicone headstrap features a top-slotted clip to allow easy adjustment and prevent strap slippage
eqswsuprs.reviews:
By Bjornar
from The Burbs of MN

These are my first goggles I bought last year and I have probably 20+ miles in them at this point. They are still keeping out leaks and fitting well. I first tried the foam gasket bargain goggles--those were bad, very bad. The rubber gasket does it's job so well I have lines afterward on my face. The tinted lenses are not too dark to use indoors in the pool but will give decent sun coverage outdoors. Range of vision is good and the fit is nice and snug. Obviously they will fog up if mistreated or simply because of the head of your body, but that's not the end of the world. You don't need to be able to find pennies on the bottom of the pool or anything.

eqswsuses.jcr:title: Seastar Flip Flops
eqswsuses.summary: Water resistant and durable, Seastar is known for its great non-slip tread.
eqswsuses.features:
Neoprene jersey strap linings are soft against bare skin
Toe posts are made of soft, flexible nylon for comfort between toes
Compression molded EVA midsoles feature anatomic footbeds to give a supportive fit and long-lasting cushioning
eqswsuses.reviews:
By Wandering Oregonian
from Bangkok, Thailand

These flip-flops are probably the most comfortable pair I have ever tried on. The foot bed is cushioned but firm and provides excellent arch support. They do not become slippery when they get wet (a problem I have experienced with other brands). They are great at casual events, as well as by the poolside or beach front. I have worn mine through an entire vacation, from the plane to the beach, and from the hotel to the restaurant. These flip-flops do it all. The nylon toe strap may take a day or two to break in, but I did not even notice it after the first half hour.

eqswsumak.jcr:title: Manta Ray Snorkel and Dive Mask
eqswsumak.summary: The Manta Ray Dive Mask and Snorkel combo brings you into crystal-clear contact with the world below the water's surface.
eqswsumak.features:
Mask features beveled sides that provide a wide field of vision and an adjustable head strap with soft-touch, quick-release buckles
Silicone face skirt forms a tight seal with your face and helps keep water out
Snorkel features a silicone mouthpiece that fits comfortably in your mouth
A shaped top prevents waves from entering snorkel from the front, back and sides, ensuring you won't be surprised by inhaling an errant wave
eqswsumak.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.

meotwipot.jcr:title: Portland Hooded Jacket
meotwipot.summary: The Portland Hooded Jacket takes you from the office to the airport in style.
meotwipot.features:
• Cotton canvas exterior is lined with warm polyester fleece to take the chill out of a winter day
  • Flip up the hood for protection against cool temperatures
  • Full-zip front allows easy on and off; chin guard protects your skin
meotwipot.reviews:
By 24601
from Boulder, CO

I was looking for a casual jacket that was warm, had nice features from my technical wear like protected sleeves (sealed wrists), headphone routing, and a hood. 

But, I spend so much time wearing my technical gear, I don't want to don technical gear when I'm hanging out. I think it looks tacky but I love the function of it.

This jacket hits the jackpot on looking great, but being functional where I need it on a casual jacket.

meotwibrt.jcr:title: Brooklyn Coat
meotwibrt.summary: Protection from the elements doesn't mean you have to look like a mountaineer. The waterproof Brooklyn Coat keeps you looking sharp while shedding rain.
meotwibrt.features:
• Removable faux fur trim
  • Includes a full-length zipper and webbing-mounted buttons on the front placket
  • Regular fit that is not too baggy, not too tight
meotwibrt.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.

meskwielt.jcr:title: El Gordo Down Jacket
meskwielt.summary: With bigger channels and more fill, this extra toasty jacket is ideal as a midlayer or stand-alone in cold climes.
meskwielt.features:
• Sharp-looking, ripstop polyester shell, with a waterproof finish, blocks the wind and resists tears and abrasion
  • Finer details include top-quality 800-fill-power goose down, a quilted-through construction, nylon-bound elastic cuffs and a drawcord hem
  • Includes 2 zip hand pockets and 1 interior zip-secure pocket; removable hood
meskwielt.reviews:
By abejar
from Ohio

I've worn this jacket in temperatures from 25-45 F. I've worn it in high winds, in sleet, and in a light rain. Wind chills have been in single digits. It's done a great job of keeping me warm. Very windproof. Very warm, esp. with the hood up. I typically have had a sweater or sweatshirt on in temps <40. For temps <20, I'm anticipating needing another layer (monkey jacket/ fleece will make this sucker very formidable). In walking through rain it does a decent job of shedding the drops but feels like a wet trash bag on your skin. Not surprising and it's not designed to be in the rain for any extended period. Its fine for a few minutes.

Construction and materials seem good. Good solid stitching. I haven't found the zipper to be an issue (had read some reviews where people had problems). Drawstring around waist will be nice. Good sleeve and coat lengths. Very warm hand pockets and this zippers are great. It is still a puffy jacket but not nearly as out of control as many I've seen.

meotwidot.jcr:title: Double Breasted Raincoat
meotwidot.summary: Our best selling Double Breasted Raincoat is now more waterproof, more breathable and more comfortable to wear!
meotwidot.features:
• All-season jacket is not only lightweight and compressible, but renowned for its water shedding, breathable performance and reliable comfort
  • Features a 2.5-layer waterproof, breathable polyurethane coating; ceramic particles add durability, waterproof reliability, and improved comfort
  • 100% taped seams seal out the elements
meotwidot.reviews:
By TomC
from Albany, OR

I own two of these jackets and have worn them often in many activities (walking, hiking, backpacking, rafting) and different weather conditions over the last eight years. They have always kept me dry & comfortable and have proven to be quite breathable, especially when the pit zips are open.

meotwislt.jcr:title: Slopeside Coat
meotwislt.summary: 4-in-1 jacket creates options for changing conditions. Jacket sports a waterproof, breathable shell and an insulated, reversible liner jacket.
meotwislt.features:
• Wear the shell jacket and zip-in liner jacket together for maximum protection or wear either piece on its own as weather conditions warrant; liner is reversible
  • Quilted liner jacket uses polyfiber insulation to keep you warm without inhibiting mobility
  • Liner jacket features zippered handwarmer pockets and an internal security pocket
meotwislt.reviews:
By PhilJeep
from ALbuquerque, NM

The fit is great, appears to be durable, and has plenty of pockets. The coat is much warmer than you'd think it would be. I've used it in the mountains in northern New Mexico and southern Colorado. If you're hiking or snowshoeing, you'll be too warm unless it's below 25F and there's a slight breeze. If you're standing still, it'll probably be OK. I only have one complaint, and that's with the zip-in fleece liner. The material is really "sticky", so it's hard to put on without having your sleeves bunch up. The little tab that holds the liner in place by your wrist works when taking the coat off, but when putting it on, the liner tends to come out of the outer sleeve (3 or 4 inches) and then you have to stuff it back in. This isn't too bad is you put the coat on once and wear it all day, but if you tend to put it on and off several times a day, it gets to be pretty annoying. A simple nylon or other lining in the sleeve would get the coat a 5-star rating.

meskwimis.jcr:title: Midweight Fleece Gloves
meskwimis.summary: Form-fitting, breathable fleece gloves are designed to keep hands warm while allowing maximum digital dexterity.
meskwimis.features:
• Fleece contours comfortably to your hands, blocks wind and allows excellent freedom of movement
  • Suede palms with silicon dots on thumbs and fingertips provide a sure grip and remain supple, even in wet weather
  • Elasticized wristbands keep the weather out and your body heat in
meskwimis.reviews:
By WoodsDude
from Maryland

I got these a few years back, and they are just now starting to wear out. They had little bumps on the fingers, but those were gone in about 5 minutes as soon as I climbed something. So even without the grippy bumps they work fantastic! These are the only gloves I've owned that have long enough fingers. My hands aren't that large(I don't think), but whatever hand they use to size most gloves must be missing the top half-inch of fingertip it seems. The between finger seam on these actually goes down to where my fingers meet! I was amazed with that. My area just got pounded with snow, and after days and days of shoveling/snowball fights, well it's about time for new gloves. I shouldn't have used these as snow gloves, but I don't have a decent pair other than these, so the constant soaking/drying has left them in need of replacement. Not the glove's fault, they just aren't meant for heavy snow use.

meotwicls.jcr:title: Classic Leather Gloves
meotwicls.summary: Leather gloves offer a low-bulk fit for excellent dexterity and a classic look that can be dressed up or down.
meotwicls.features:
• Elastic at the wrists helps seal out wind and snow
  • Polyester lining helps wick sweat off your hands to keep them dry
meotwicls.reviews:
By Janet
from St Paul

Ordered these gloves for my husband and he likes them. The leather is soft and polished and the lining is nice and soft.

meotwizuf.jcr:title: Zurich Wool Scarf
meotwizuf.summary: Warp yourself in warmth this winter with the Zurich Scarf, woven in natural wool
meotwizuf.features: • Lightweight merino wool design offers soft and luxurious warmth
meotwizuf.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed.  Be the first to write a review.

meotsuann.jcr:title: Analog Dark Wash Jean
meotsuann.summary: From the city streets to the climbing crag, the Analog Dark Wash Jean gives you old-school style.
meotsuann.features:
• Button fly closure
  • Regular rise
  • Two front pockets
  • One buttoned coin pocket
  • Three back pockets
  • Twisted outseams
meotsuann.reviews:
By GBAus
from Austin, TX

The style is mature and straight. Mature meaning I don't look like a 44 year old guy trying to be 24 with baggy cargo pockets all over.  My only wish is that they came in carbon color.


By jamesm
from New York

These are great looking jeans and feel really nice when new. However, I have had several pairs that fade in days - not months. Quality is not what it should be in a pair of jeans at this price level.

mehisutrs.jcr:title: Trail Model Pants
mehisutrs.summary: The Trail Model Pants to the test on your next climbing trip, trail hike or globe-trotting adventure.
mehisutrs.features:
• Nylon/spandex fabric resists abrasion and has an all-weather finish to help shed moisture; fabric dries quickly when wet
  • Double-thick panels on the knees and rear hem ensure long-lasting wear in the outdoors
  • Feature 2 front hand pockets and 2 rear pockets (right rear pocket has a flap for added security); zippered cargo pocket on the left secures trail essentials
  • Pant legs roll up and secure in place with snaps
mehisutrs.reviews:
By Pete2599
from Central, CA

These pants are incredible for all-around use. I've traveled, camped, and hiked in them. The roll up leg is a real plus for warmer weather, but they're so breathable, it's hardly necessary. Dressy enough for heading into town. They last forever! I purchased a second pair years ago and they're still waiting in the closet - my first pair remain in great condition!

meotsutrs.jcr:title: Tribeca Cargo Pants
meotsutrs.summary: Look good at the office or on a stroll through town with the classy Tribeca Cargo Pants.
meotsutrs.features:
• Organic cotton is combined with linen for comfort and style
  • Front slant pockets and 2 cargo pockets stow your necessities
  • Pants include a zipper fly and a button at the waist; flat front
meotsutrs.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.

mehisucos.jcr:title: Corona Shorts
mehisucos.summary: Corona shorts offer quick-drying convenience and travel-savvy details that are a perfect match for active lifestyles
mehisucos.features:
• Lightweight peached nylon fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable on the go; fabric has a soft, smooth feel
  • With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays
  • Secure your travel and trail essentials in the 2 side-seam zippered pockets or side cargo pockets
mehisucos.reviews:
By YearAroundTheWorld
from Florida

These shorts rock! I use them all the time for travel and everyday use, as swimming trunks too. Lightweight, but not so flimsy that they bunch up easy or feel strange like some other brands. They air dry very fast too. 

The best part about them is that they look great, you don't look like a gear-nerd with elastic waistbands, mesh panels, huge logos, etc.

I own an older version of them, as well as this new version. This updated style has been improved with larger thigh pockets, better zippers, and zippered back pockets instead of buttons. All were changes that I love.


By srd123
from Seattle, WA

I have three pairs of these shorts. They're great except for the zippers. The zipper pulls have broken on all three pairs. 1 pair- both pockets and the fly; 1 pair- both pockets; and 1 pair- one pocket.

mehisubus.jcr:title: Buffalo Plaid Shorts
mehisubus.summary: The Buffalo Shorts are stylish yet versatile warm-weather gear that will save you space in your luggage.
mehisubus.features:
• Polyester and spandex blend offers stretch for comfort
  • Side hand pockets and a rear zippered pocket provide plenty of places to stash the small things you require traveling
  • Drawstring at the waist provides a comfortable, personalized fit
mehisubus.reviews:
By stowe.perry
from Greenville, SC

So far I've worn these shorts to play Ultimate and Basketball. There is just enough stretch to allow free movement. The shorts also wick very quickly. I live in South Carolina at the moment and it is very humid here. Usually when I wear shorts or anything stretching they are so wet it feels like I just jumped out of a pool. These shorts stayed pretty dry and allowed me to wipe my hands like they were a towel. Pockets are also nice to have. There is a zipper pocket in the back which is great when you're at the beach and need a place to put your key. The shorts seem durable and I'm not scared they are going to rip. The fabric is also very lightweight.

mehisusts.jcr:title: Stretch Fatigue Shorts
mehisusts.summary: Be comfortable no matter where you are climbing a rock wall, riding a bus in the Andes or just chilling with your friends at a backyard barbecue.
mehisusts.features:
• Nylon fabric has just a touch of spandex for comfortable stretch and is also quick drying
  • Generous cargo pockets
  • Ventilated inseam gusset and mesh pocket material combine to make shorts that breathe extremely well
  • Streamlined adjustable waistband for a comfortable, personalized fit
mehisusts.reviews:
By WestIsBEST
from Tempe, AZ
 
Very comfy, easily adjustable waist, sit well even under a backpack's waist belt all day. Not that I'd wear them for soccer, but the touch of stretch means you have easy movement for hiking etc. Fast drying, good looking. Lightweight but appear to be quite durable. All the little details like pocket positioning, vents, reinforced stitching, soft lining at waist = excellent. Only downside was a couple of loose stitch ends I snipped off when I bought them, but nothing unraveled or otherwise appears amiss. Impressive product, very pleased with these shorts and so went back bought the pants too.

mehisusls.jcr:title: Slot Canyon Active Shorts
mehisusls.summary: With multiple pockets for stowing must-have items, the lightweight Slot Canyon Active Shorts bring comfort and convenience to your hiking and traveling adventures.
mehisusls.features:
• Lightweight nylon fabric dries quickly, resists pilling and is easy to pack away in a backpack
  • With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays
  • Fabric is treated with a Durable Water Repellent? finish to repel moisture and stains
  • Included webbing belt can be completely removed if desired; waist features a snap and a zippered fly
mehisusls.reviews:
By Avid Hiker
from Maryland

I have many pairs of the previous version of the Slot Canyon Short, but won't be buying any of these. I use them for hiking, and hiking shorts shouldn't have such long legs. I don't care for the changes to the pockets either. Please change back!


By Msmity
from Nashville, Tn

I have five pairs of the older model of this short and they are amazing. Probably the best shorts I have ever owned. I went to get some more when I had worn out some of them and they had a new model. I thought surely this will only be better. I was very wrong the new design is horrible. They are too long, don't tighten well with new belt, no hidden pocket(best feature in older model), and no zipper on cargo pocket. I was very disappointed and will never buy another pair until they return to the older model.

mesusupis.jcr:title: Pipeline Board Shorts
mesusupis.summary: Pick up the tried-and-true Pipeline Board Shorts to equip yourself for soaking up the sun and surfing some waves.
mesusupis.features:
• Lightweight Supplex nylon fabric has a Durable Water Repellent? finish to help shed moisture and speed drying times
  • Zippered pocket on right side secures small essentials; plastic zipper pull won't corrode
  • Pocket includes an internal key clip
mesusupis.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed. Be the first to write a review.

meotwisus.jcr:title: Sussex Rain Boots
meotwisus.summary: Classic in style, the Sussex Rain Boots provide excellent waterproof protection and great traction.
meotwisus.features:
• Mid-height natural rubber uppers form a tough waterproof barrier to keep slush and puddles at bay
  • Shaft circumference is 15 in. and based on size 7; measurement is for the outside of the boot shaft and, in general, the internal measurement is roughly 1 in. shorter
  • Polyester microfleece linings are soft to the touch, wick moisture to regulate foot temperature and add insulation in cold weather
meotwisus.reviews: This item is not yet reviewed.  Be the first to write a review.

meotsuett.jcr:title: Eton Short-Sleeve Shirt
meotsuett.summary: Express yourself around town or at play with our rugby-inspired Eton shirt.
meotsuett.features:
• 100% cotton fabric
  • Classic stripes at sleeve add appeal
  • Traditional fit is not too tight, not too loose
meotsuett.reviews:
By BEACH MAN
from POMPANO BEACH FL

GOOD T-SHIRT. 


By RyanScreen
from Collegedale, TN

Bought a small in this shirt. It feels much larger than any other small I've tried on before. It's fine if you like your shirts baggy, otherwise I would suggest downsizing.

meotsuamt.jcr:title: Amsterdam Short-Sleeve Travel Shirt
meotsuamt.summary: The Amsterdam travel shirt features a soft, breathable fabric blend that keeps you comfortable on city adventures.
meotsuamt.features:
• Cotton/polyester/spandex blend wicks moisture and has a soft hand
  • Fabric has a touch of stretch to ease movements
  • Button placket lets you adjust the ventilation
  • Classic fit that follows body contours without being tight
meotsuamt.reviews:
By gregorio
from Saint Paul, MN

I use this for hiking, travel, and as casual wear to the bar. It's so functional and easy to clean that I'm taking two shirts with me to Senegal, Africa for two years with the Peace Corps.

mehisulat.jcr:title: Laguna Short-Sleeve Shirt
mehisulat.summary: Don't sacrifice function for style. The Laguna is perfect for adventures at home or in the great outdoors.
mehisulat.features:
• Blend of recycled polyester and organic cotton delivers comfort and style that you can feel good about
  • Contrasting stitch details add appeal
  • Chest pockets stash essentials
mehisulat.reviews: This item is not yet rated. Be the first to write a review.

mehiwiext.jcr:title: Expedition Tech Long-Sleeved Shirt
mehiwiext.summary: High tech fabric means you can stay comfortable wherever you go, from the desert to the tropics to alpine terrain.
mehiwiext.features:
• Lightweight nylon fabric wicks moisture, dries quickly and breathes easily for great comfort
  • Integrated mesh ventilation at the back yoke and under the arms helps keep you cool while traveling in warm climates
  • Cargo-style chest pockets provide ample space for travel essentials
  • Button-close chest pockets keep small items secure
mehiwiext.reviews:
By 1975Hiker
from Monterey, CA
I bought this shirt for backpacking mainly. It is light and dries fairly quickly. Pockets are handy but the sleeves are a little bit short. 

By Dynasty301
from North Carolina
I took this shirt in the green color on a 3 month bike tour and like it a lot. It's very lightweight, packs small, and dries quickly. For a "tall" it could actually be a bit taller, but it's reasonable and I always wear the sleeves rolled up part way anyways.
